title: Chocolate marble cake with chocolate truffles
description: This chocolate cake is a chocaholic’s dream! It’s perfect for birthdays or celebrations.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you’ll need a 20cm/8in round cake tin and board and a 15cm/6in round cake tin and board. You will also need four dowelling rods (available from specialist cake shops).
ingredients: 175g/6oz plain chocolate, melted, plus extra chocolate curls
225g/8oz white chocolate, melted, plus extra chocolate curls
